GermaParl 1.3.0

Download full GermaParl corpus.

Source: R/download.R
download.Rd

The GermaParl R package includes only a small subset of the GermaParl corpus (GERMAPARLMINI). The full corpus is deposited with zenodo, a repository for research data. The germaparl_download_corpus function downloads a tarball with the indexed corpus from the zenodo repository and installs the corpus within the GermaParl package. When calling the function, a stable and fast internet connection will be useful as the size of the data amounts to ~1 GB which needs to be downloaded.

germaparl_download_corpus(
  doi = "https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3735141",
  quiet = FALSE
)

Arguments

doi

The DOI (Digital Object Identifier) of the GermaParl tarball at zenodo, presented as a hyperlink. Defaults to the latest version of GermaParl.
quiet

Whether to suppress progress messages, defaults to FALSE.

Value

A logical value, TRUE if the corpus has been installed successfully.

Details

After downloading and installing the tarball with the CWB indexed corpus, the registry file for the GERMAPARL corpus will be amended by the DOI and the corpus version, to make this information for the citation information that is provided when calling the function citation.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
if (!germaparl_is_installed()) germaparl_download_corpus()
use("GermaParl")
corpus() # should include GERMAPARLMINI and GERMAPARL
count("GERMAPARL", "Daten") # an arbitrary test
}
